snippet: The national security adviser, Susan E. Rice, insisted that she had been right to assert that Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl served with “honor and distinction.”
abstract: Pres Obama's national security adviser Susan E Rice finds herself under fire from Republicans for statements she made about prisoner of war Sgt Bowe Bergdahl; Rice insists she was right to assert that Bergdahl served with 'honor and distinction' amid questions of whether he walked off his base.
lead_paragraph: The national security adviser, Susan E. Rice, insisted that she had been right to assert that Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl served with “honor and distinction.”

headline.seo: Susan Rice Affirms View That P.O.W. Served With ‘Honor’
headline.main: Obama Aide Defends Remarks on Bergdahl’s ‘Honor’
headline.print_headline: Obama Aide Defends Remarks on Bergdahl’s ‘Honor’
